title: Beef and Pizza
description: Bring us your tired, and huddled masses, and we'll feed them pizza and listen to course complaints. Hosted by our fearless leader, this is the primary source of course adjustments to the degree, so your voices definitely count. Come by on March 5th from 12:30 to 2:30 in the Great Hall North at the UBC Student Nest.

title: Annual General Meeting
description: What the hell does Fizz Council do and why do they do it? This is a chance to meet the current student council and learn what their roles are. If you're interested in running for a council position in the future, this is a highly recommended event. Come by the Penthouse at LIFE 2116 from 4:00 to 5:00 on February 28th.

title: Fizz Talks III
description: Variety show of presentations, talks, musical performances and other sundry feats by your fellow classmates. Snacks and refreshments provided by your friendly neighborhood Fizz Council. Check it out at Hennings 201 from 5:00 to 7:00 on March 1st
